mapper.insert: insert into admin_table(admin_name, admin_password, admin_level, admin_remark, admin_from, create_time, update_time) VALUES(#{adminName},#{adminPassword},#{adminLevel},#{adminRemark},#{adminFrom},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.update: update admin_table set admin_name = #{adminName}, admin_password = #{adminPassword}, admin_level = #{adminLevel}, admin_remark = #{adminRemark}, admin_from = #{adminFrom}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from admin_table where admin_name = #{adminName} and admin_password = #{adminPassword}
